News.Title: Vilas Transcore Reports Strong H1 Performance with 74% Revenue Growth
News.Summary: Vilas Transcore delivered robust H1 results with revenue surging 74% to 2.3B rupees from 1.6B rupees year-over-year, while net profit jumped 74% to 244M rupees from 140M rupees. The company's operational efficiency improved significantly with EBITDA rising to 311M rupees from 179M rupees and EBITDA margin expanding to 13.60% from 11.04% year-over-year.

News.Title: Vilas Transcore Ltd: Analyst Initiates Coverage with 'Buy' Rating, Cites Strong Growth Potential
News.Summary: Phillip Capital initiates coverage on Vilas Transcore with a 'Buy' rating and ₹638 target price. The company, which manufactures transformer components, has seen its stock rise 166% since its IPO in June 2024. Analysts cite strong positioning in India's energy sector, robust financials, and planned capacity expansion as key growth drivers.
